2.1: .And the asses of Kish were lost. And now, the verb "lost" is always connected with the letter mem, and here is is with the letter lamed, in order to teach us that they weren't truly lost, rather disappeared in that hour for the very reason of Kish the father of Saul, reasoning that he was the father of Saul so the asses were lost so that Saul would go to retrieve them.
